website_summaries.verdict: A great option if you are looking for a sturdy cue rack with an outdoorsy style.
pros: Top-shelf quality meant to last for years
Product is stable and sturdy while remaining lightweight
cons: Handcrafted construction leaves some areas of the rack prone to splintering

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Good Looking and as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: First, the product was well-packaged. VERY easy to put together with good instructions and screws/holes all lined up perfectly. Took less than ten minutes. The product looks like wood is supposed to look and is really quite beautiful. It's sturdy and holds up well. The only thing I wish it had was a hook to hang a rack on, but I'll drill a hole in the front or side and add it. Very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Dana S.

customer_reviews.title: super cute for a cabin
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one after seeing rustic sets on Esty for a lot more money. It took about 4 minutes to unbox and put together- only needing a screw driver. It is sturdy I just wish it had a hook to hang the ball rack triangle thing.
customer_reviews.author: Lg

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rustic look
customer_reviews.text: I was quit surprised by the build quality and simplicity of assembly. This fit very well in my brother-in-law’s game room. One suggestion however, adjustable feet-pads; for uneven tile floors ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Rabin

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and a great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rustic looking pool table holder, only thing I would like is a hook for the Wood Triangle but other than that it is great. Looks good and good value. Even the guy who setup the pool table complimented the piece.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Grajewski

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It came very well packaged to prevent damage. Product was in great condition when I opened it. Super Easy to put together and is well built. looks great in our pool room!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup and Great Rusyic Look
customer_reviews.text: Lovely rack! I bought this for my husband. Very easy setup and build. The rustic look is warm and charming. I appreciate the cup holders. It does it’s job and does it well. Great piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Fort

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look. I had my boyfriend drill holes all along the back as well so it holds more pool cues. It was well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tina P

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Color fit well with the floor We weren’t looking for a corner cue holder and this one worked well in fact we bought two
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice rack
customer_reviews.text: Best flat square rack with cup holders you can buy. Wasn’t huge fan of the rustic look but it’s growing on me. Worth it for the price
customer_reviews.author: Zach Hallett

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was SO easy to put together, took maybe 5 minutes. Was surprised how good the quality is. Great addition to our pool table.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: looks great, light weight but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: looks great, light weight but sturdy, easy to put together, the pieces do not fit perfectly, a little crooked or would give it a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: C. Adams DVM

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love my pool cue holder. Easy to assemble and looks great! Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Nice storage rack
customer_reviews.text: This cue rack is nice. The rustic look and feel is very unique. The entire rack was a tad bit difficult to put together despite how simple the steps are. The built in cup holders don't seem very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I needed to find a standing rack for my cue sticks. I perused a variety of models. Then I spotted the Rush Creek stand. Wow! Each is rustic and one of a kind. Everyone remarks on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves it, my husband put it together quick. Very sturdy pool rack, love the look. It looks like we spent a lot of money on this cue rack. Don’t hesitate to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in our log cabin
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in our log cabin, fits right in with all the wood. Drink coasters built in are a plus too.
customer_reviews.author: tina pawelek

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! The assembly design is well though out ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! The assembly design is well though out with the fasteners not visible. It's stable. Trying to bring the log cabin look into the basement of our log cabin. This does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: farmgirl

customer_reviews.title: Very nice 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Super stable and nice looking piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Yuli

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Easy to assemble. A little lighter than I thought it would be. But, seriously, looks greats. Many nice comments from friends.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Christoffersen

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great!
customer_reviews.text: The stand is quite sturdy and the perfect size for our needs. Easy to put together and will last for some time, I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and good looks
customer_reviews.text: This item fits perfectly in our Harley themed game room with rustic modern house. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: Well made and it matches my bar and bar stools.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, easy to assemble, however wood was not smooth in some areas and a bit splintered.
customer_reviews.author: slpgirl

customer_reviews.title: No instructions and missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: Looked Great once I figured out how to assemble it and make a trip to the hardware store to get the proper screws. And unfortunately the screws needed to assemble it are an unusual size.
customer_reviews.author: kelly price

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Could have a bit larger holes for cues to fit in...
customer_reviews.author: S.W. Esaias

customer_reviews.title: no screws
customer_reviews.text: I didn't receive the screws for the base go mount??
customer_reviews.author: Cody Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very durable and holds up better than most wall racks
customer_reviews.author: luke

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is well made, good quality and a good buy for our pool room!
customer_reviews.author: MarketingMomx4

customer_reviews.title: Quality of this cue rack is pretty decent, almost no reason to spend 5-10x the ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality of this cue rack is pretty decent, almost no reason to spend 5-10x the price more to get one of the similar competing cue racks!
customer_reviews.author: Alex P. Koch

customer_reviews.title: and how easy it was to put together
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled with how this looks, the price, and how easy it was to put together!
customer_reviews.author: deb3009

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband received this as a gift he would never want anyone to use the cup holders
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great floor rack!
customer_reviews.text: We love the rack, it is well made and sturdy. We added a nice doorstop on both sides to hold the ball racks.
customer_reviews.author: Rinky

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for ...this seems sturdy, & it is real wood ..but if we spill a drink on it I wont cry.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: super nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, sturdy, stands up well when loaded with pool cues. Drink holders are perfect size fir most any drink
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly_424

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This pool cue rack looks really cool and fits in perfectly with our downstairs decor. When I got the package I wasn't sure how sturdy it would be, but once assembled it is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: makeawishmn

product_meta.title: Rush Creek Creations Rustic Log 6 Billiard Cue Storage Rack - No Tool Assembly - Handcrafted Solid Pine
product_meta.description: Easy to store cue rack makes for a great game of billiards with family and friends! The Rush Creek Creations Rustic Log 6 Billiard Cue Rack makes a perfect addition to your game area. Handcrafted with solid pine, this rack is constructed with a skip-peel finish and treated with polyurethane to provide superior scratch resistance, keeping your rack in top condition. Holding up to 6 standard billiard cues, this standing floor rack positions the cues side by side so every cue can be easily accessed at any time. The base contains grooves to comfortable store a full set of 16 billiard balls and the top of the rack offers 4 built-in drink holders for that extra convenience, saving your billiard table and other furniture from any beverage accidents. Great for a matching set of Rush Creek Creations chairs, stools, tables, and bars, this rack will bring warmth to any game room! Includes 1 billiard cue rack. Billiard cues sold separately.
feature_bullets: UNIQUE BILLIARD CUE AND BALLS RACK: Handcrafted solid pine billiard cue and balls standing rack for up to 6 cues (cues not included)
CONVENIENT BASE GROOVES: Base grooves hold a full set of 16 billiard balls
DRINK HOLDERS: 4 built-in drink holders provide extra convenience when playing
RUSTIC STYLE: Checking is the natural drying process that creates splits in the wood for that true rustic look
MEASURES: Rack measures 26.5" L x 8.6" W x 28.75" H when assembled

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
